name: Zamazenta
description: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master’s Shield. It was feared and respected by all.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Power Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can’t attack.
